title: Lucasarts Outlaws (1997) - Patched for Windows XP/7/8 incl. Mult
description:
Lucasarts Outlaws (1997) - Patched for Windows XP/7/8 incl. Multiplayer

INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Mount 'Outlaws Disc 1.iso'
2. Intall Outlaws using 'OutlawsSetup.exe' to 'C:LucasArtsOutlaws'
3. Delete all files in 'C:LucasArtsOutlaws' and replace with the files in the 'Patched Outlaws' folder
4. Install nGlide using 'nGlide102_setup.exe'
5. Configure nGlide to your native resolution
6. Configure Outlaws to use Glide 2.3
7. Play Outlaws!

NOTES:

Includes all official patches pre-installed
This has been tested to run multiplayer between Win XP/7/8, in either 32bit or 64bit windows using Direct Play and TCP/IP
You MAY get graphical errors in the game menus on Windows 7
